data.title: Mobile App FAQs
data.text:
This is the home screen.

The menu at the footer contains four options:

“Home” takes you back to the home screen

“Schedules” shows you today’s schedule

“Reservations” shows you your reservations

“Hours” shows you all branch hours

While your membership includes access to all of the Metropolitan Los Angeles Y branches, setting your preferred branch enables you to focus on the classes at the branch you use most.

Your preferred branch is in the top right of the screen. To set your preferred branch:

Press the menu in the top left

Select the account from the menu in the top right

Select “Change Preferred Facility”

Choose your preferred branch from the dropdown menu & press save

Book a Class:

Book a Class is for all group exercise classes and personal training

Reserve a Spot:

Reserve a Spot is for all facility, court, equipment and swim lane reservations. Reservations can be made one (1) hour + seven (7) days in advance.

(Please make sure you’ve set you’re default branch or select an alternate location or all locations if you’d like to see other branch schedules)

Make sure your preferred branch is selected, or choose all locations

Select Book a Class

Select the date you’d like to attend

Choose your class and press reserve

You can reserve a spot in any of our group exercise classes up to seven (7) days in advance. Classes that have finished will no longer appear on the app.

(Please make sure you’ve set you’re default branch or select an alternate location or all locations if you’d like to see other branch schedules)

Select Reserve a Spot

Select the date you’d like to make your reservation

Choose the equipment you’d like to reserve (swim lane, etc.), the time and press reserve

Please note the following:

Lap Lane reservations are 30 or 60 minutes

Racquetball court reservations are 60 minutes

You can make equipment reservations up to seven (7) days and one (1) hour in advance. Additional same day reservations can be made upon completion of 1st reservation.

Please note, cancellations can be made up to one hour prior to your reservation.

Interested in Personal Training?

Select “Book a Class”

Select Personal Training from the top menu

Select “Schedule” for the Personal Training or Small Group Training that you prefer

Press request info to fill out a quick survey to match your needs.

A YMCA staff will follow up with you to schedule your first sessions.

Once you purchased your Personal Training program:

Select your training program (30 or 60 minutes), then select your preferred trainer.

Choose the day and time and select “Request Booking”. An email confirmation will be sent you and your training confirming your booking.

*In the right corner of this screen you will see how many trainings passes you have available. These will refill monthly as part of your registered personal training program.

Select My Reservations from the bottom menu

Select the reservation you’d like to cancel

Confirm cancellation

All members who signed up for the class will receive an email and a push notification via the app that the class has been canceled.

To Book a Class for group exercise:

Select schedules from the main menu at the top

Scroll down to the date and select the date you’d like to take the class

Choose your preferred branch or view all branches

Find the class you’d like to take

Select “Reserve”

To Reserve a Spot at the branch or to reserve equipment:

Select schedules from the main menu at the top

Select the date you’d like to make the reservation

Choose your preferred branch or view all branches

Find the equipment you’d like to reserve

Select the time you’d like to make your reservation

Select “Reserve”

We understand, things come up and plans change. When making a reservation, if you are unable to attend, it is important to cancel the reservation ahead of time whenever possible. Group Exercise classes require one hour notice and all others require as much notice as possible. This practice will allow another member of our community to fill the spot and participate.

After three missed reservations, access in the app will be suspended 14 days. If you did attend one of the reservations and you were not checked in, please let us know through emailing us directly or asking the front desk and we will work with you to resolve your use of the reservation system once again.

For all app questions, please contact us at: APPSUPPORT@YMCALA.ORG

To reactivate your membership or for other membership questions, please contact us at: MEMBERSHIP@YMCALA.ORG
